name: 2024 8th International Conference on Cloud and Big Data Computing
content: Publication: Accepted papers will be included into ICCBDC 2024 Conference Proceedings, which is published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science)
